name: Whiterock Bay
description:
On your way to Whiterock Bay you encounter a series of strange events.

Try to escape the terror of the small coastal town in this short game.

Controls:

W / S - Move Backward / Forward

A / D - Turn Left / Right

Shift - Move Faster

Space / Enter / E - Interact

F - Toggle Flashlight

F11 - Toggle Fullscreen
